divs: sighting detailsi was born in 1956 and i think i was around 11 or 12 years old. my father and i used to sit out at night a listen to the radio, it was at the time of the song,,,in the year 2525,,,was playing.,,,,anyhow my mother had a friend over to visit..a very good witness....as i sat in my lawn chair,,there was a ,,disk,,as it came over me ,,,and got as large as 3\4 of the sky..and continued to go on behind me..it was not fast and was not slow,,,but it did not have a tail or sound and was an orange or red and glowed from the inside out..it scared me so bad,,i thought it was the ''end of time''..i actualy started crying...and i have witneses...anyhow,,my father was right beside me and did not see it,,,it was only a moment.i am serious and it is a fact,,,,this is the first time to actually report this to anyone who would listen.{pid}i know it sounds crazy,,,,but a friend of mine and i were on our bikes ,,,one afternoon and saw two ,,ufos,,that sparkled,,the first was red and right behind it was a green and both,,,sparkled,,a fact,,only up the street from where i live and saw the first one,,my friend is a witness...this was a year or two later. a real fact on both accounts,,sincerly, mark freeman
Summary: A red disk that flew over without a tail and glowed from the inside out.
